name: Neight Renegado
text:
Always have gotten my order right and in fair time.
Great pizza. Love combining crust flavors.

name: Kyle Derply
text: After waiting for 35 minutes inside the store, I find out the pizzas were burnt. Horrible. Avoid this location. And no, "Howard", I won't give your trashy restaurant another chance. Why would I? I have no reason to want burnt, cold pizza... Which is all your location is able to provide.

name: Bill Band
text: Little skimpy on the toppings other than that very good been going there for years there has been a change

name: Taylor bauske
text: I ordered online at 5:24pm and the website said my order would take 40mins..pizza didn’t get to me until 6:38pm called the this store, all I got was “sorry we can’t help you” OH and my pizza didn’t have butter cheese crust! Lol manger said his name was Tony?!

name: Halley Press
text: Always good food. Have had the same delivery guy every time - and he is very polite. But most importantly, we requested a drawing of, "a dragon fighting a dinosaur on a rainbow." And Juan truly did a wonderful job - A+ Juan, A+.

name: Linda Stoner
text: They have gluten free pizza pricing within expected amount

name: Tim Popma
text: We've been getting pizza from here for many years. Really good pizza at a  good price

name: BH.Senior
text: I frequent this location and for reason the customer service is super inconsistent. They have failed me 3 times already, once more this evening. Delivered order is wrong, super greasy with horrible presentation. Not to mention I was quoted …More

name: Joel B
text: Their pizza is very good and its impressive how many different kinds they sell. The restaurant is clean as a whistle and the staff are friendly. …More

name: Jon doe
text: Ordered a pizza at 715 pm order number 127 I didn't receive order until a hour and 45mins later. When I called to see what was wrong I got a answering machine saying they were close. So I ordered pizza which has arrived and not they show at …More

name: Jody Bowen
text: My parents ordered Hungry Howie's back in the 90's and I disliked their pizza. However recently I ordered from them and they called me personally to fix a double order. The service was fast and the food was fantastic. I am impressed with their wonderful staff and definitely will be coming back

name: Nedzad Selmic
text:
My appologies to you and your Team I have just Noticed that i had left the Review for the Wrong Location.
You guys always do a great Job There …More

name: Christina Castanie
text: Just terrific food and their crew members are very sweet.. Thank you Zach T  for the great service and short  conversation  .. just a great end to a hectic day !!

name: Paul Dillinger
text: This is the best Howie's location I've been to. The staff is always friendly and the pizza is consistently good.

name: Krista Jobe
text: Love that you can decide which topping you want to go on the pizza (half and half). Subs, salads and wings are also very good!!!

name: Gerardo Jilote
text: Excellent service, delivery drivers are always nice and speedy and my order is on point when it gets to my house.

name: Britni Kammers
text: Some of the best Hungry Howies I've had in a while. Everything was made as ordered and arrived fast. Ordered 2 subs, a pizza that was 1/2 & 1/2 crust and it was actually done and done right. Very happy and will definitely come back. Thank you guys so much.

name: Iron Cowboy
text: Very polite and helpful when ordering. delivery was normal for distance they traveled. Crust on pizza did have a little bit of burnt crust but only in a couple spots. Wings where ok. Food was still hot on delivery and delivery guy was nice. Would recommend and order from again.

name: Jamie Nowak
text: We ordered a pizza 2 weeks ago, when the pizza arrived it was not what we ordered. I call the store to let them know, I was told a new one would be ready in 45 minutes that we could come pick up...we had our delivered for a reason so going …More

name: Jennifer Roofe
text: First time eating their pizza and I love the flavor. Wasn't too salty like others I've eaten.

name: Gideon Ollen
text: It was amazing and super friendly

name: Carol Rummelt
text: Hmmm. This doesn't look like the pizza we ordered.

name: Dave Cetlinski
text: Better than home of the $5 pizza.

name: Trai Will
text: I love their sesame seed crust on pizza, my favorites are the Italian calzone & bread sticks & Howie wings! ALL ARE EXCELLENT

name: Seda Child_of_God
text: Love the pizza and Cheesy stuffed howie bread!!!

name: Jessica Groulx
text: I love Hungry Howies pizza. So I ordered and it took almost 2 hours for my pizza to come. My pizza was cold. The guy left my pizza on the desk where I had to walk around to get it did not hand it to me just left it and walked out. Smh this …More

name: Jen Bowen
text: The dough of my pizza was raw. You'd think if they took over an hour on one pizza they would at least cook it.

name: Ronald Covington
text: For the cost, not bad again. It's not gourmet .

I love the food served here, it’s delicious, but I don’t like the website. Every time I try to order online for delivery, the website can’t find a location close to me, which forces me to have to choose another restaurant.

name: Christine Beckwith
text: Excellent food and customer service

name: Lisa Hess
text: Really good food i love it thanks

name: Tracy Cross
text: Unfortunately I have received multiple undercooked howie rolls and pizzas from this particular store. Hungry Howie's is amazing, but this location doesn't always fully cook their food. It's a shame since their food is so delicious!

name: Matthew Sieting
text: I ordered a pizza for delivery, it took almost an hour to arrive. The pizza was cold and so greasy that the box was falling apart. When I tried to contact through Facebook, I got an automated joke of a response.

name: Bethanie Reed
text: My order gets messed up pretty often and one of the new guys up front put his dirty fingers on my calzone. However the manager and a few of the long time employees have gone above and beyond to fix whats happened and made it worth me coming …More

name: Aleita R
text: My stars rating was only bc its unfair to say this was their fault and not Google's but supposedly they are open until 12am and called at 1104pm and they answered just to inform me they were closed.

name: Tiberius Galloway
text: Great food and fast delivery, affordable.

name: Alannah
text: I picked up four $5 mini pizzas with a 3 cheeser last night it was awful pizza and cheese bread made me sick cuz it tasted so bad. They say the bread was fresh but it didn't taste fresh no, I will never spend money at this establishment …More

name: Cheryl Averill
text: First, I ordered for delivery. My wait time was an hour. It got here in less then 40 minutes. Very pleased. Second, don't know if it's new staff or what, but the quality of the food has improved as well. My wife gets the turkey club …More

name: Jessica Baptiste
text: Best pizza in the area, and best customer service.

text: The staff here has been seen several times not wearing gloves when preparing food. It's already bottom rung pizza like Domino's... Doesn't need more gross

text: Supposed to be half pepperoni and half bacon.. As you can see bacon was only on TWO pieces!! Not enough cheese on pizza.. Could see right through to the sauce..Also ordered 2 subs. One of them had WAY too much Parmesan, and both of them were COLD!!!

name: Andrew Weener
text: There is nothing like the smell of a black and green olives pizza with butter crust from hungry Howie's!  Absolutely Heavenly!

name: Patricia Williams
text: The pizza was so good

name: Mike Wykes
text: Hungry Howies has (IMO) the BEST Hawaiian thin crust pizza in the whole Grand Rapids Metro area. They also offer very efficient home delivery service at a reasonable price. I particularly like the Howie Maui medium thin crust pizza with a lite cajun crust.  And, their regular (e.g. not Hawaiian) thin crust pizzas are excellent as well.

name: Nick Jackson
text: Not good pizza quality of pizza is not good

text: Purchased a large pizza. It had a very odd taste of some type of chemical so we decided to stop eating it. It was the night of the blizzard and I had gotten stuck when I went there to get it as their parking lot was full of snow so I didnt …More

text: I love hungry howies!!! 54th and eastern is the best!

text: We got there to pick up our pizzas and  there was one person working, phones ringing off the hook.  The poor lady. Pizza was fine.

text: I go to Hungry Howies quite often. I usually go to the one in Wayland or Grandville but I had to stop at this one this time around. It took them about 10 min longer to finish the meal (35 minutes for 1 medium pizza, howie bread, and sub) …More

text: Pizza tasted good, but I was a little dismayed when I found out that there was copious amounts biodicarbonates and made me feel sick in the end. Maybe every once in a while.

name: Chuck D
text: The boneless wings are very cheap quality. The Pizza wasn't too bad. The 3 Cheese Pleaser was too overwhelming. The pizza for that was also not very good quality. For good boneless wings and pizza, go to Pizza Hut.

text: Pizza was not warm. They hardly seasoned my howie bread. The pizza was partially burnt. Tasted awful. I love hungry howiea but by far this place needs to make a better effort. Highly dissatisfied and will not be visiting this branch again.

text: Food is great, service is terrible.  Mike in particular is specifically difficult.  Enjoy the food but sometimes its just not wrth dealing with them.
